duties_responsibilities.duty: Acquire essential data, plan long-term well development, organize, run, and report operations in the field environment.
Manage field operations, including engineering design, maintenance, job planning, and operational reporting.
Support engineers and specialists on-site, help with essential duties, such as risk analysis, and effectively manage a crew and/or processes.
Prepare wellsite reports and post-job debriefings, and actively contribute to continuous improvement of culture across the business.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Engineering or Applied Science
